message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SE

The paper discusses the security risks and solutions for Smart Home Systems (SHSs), which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). Additionally, the paper focuses on user activities and sensor-device-user interactions in SHSs, which relates to human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and social and information networks (cs.SI). The paper also discusses the contextual model for detecting malicious behavior, which can be related to cybernetics (cs.CY) and software engineering (cs.SE).
